title: Code sample for connected apps and devices (Project Rome)
body: I've read about "Project Rome" and the possibility of creating cross-device experiences (https://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2016/10/11/cross-device-experience-with-project-rome/), and am particularly interested in the Project Rome Android SDK (https://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2017/02/08/announcing-project-rome-android-sdk/#HQl7ibqTUGYzrufw.97).

comments.body: Thanks @projectrometeam. There are some great code sample resources there. Do you have any samples demonstrating the "Remote Sessions API"?
